rules_text:
Trample, reach
Suspend 2–{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
If you would cast Galetop Greatwurm without paying its mana cost, it’s a sorcery named Prey Upon with “Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.”
